alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 25 at 9:48PM EST until November 29 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Highest amounts are expected in eastern Cuyahoga, southern Lake, northern Geauga, and areawide Ashtabula. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph causing drifting and blowing snow. * WHERE...Cuyahoga, Lake, Geauga, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain areawide on Sunday will transition to accumulating lake effect snow Sunday night into Monday morning and lasting through early Tuesday night. The heaviest snow is expected late Monday night through early Tuesday afternoon when rates of up to 1-2"/hr will be possible. Strong winds will also create drifting and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
